title: Noam Chomsky Interview | Oxford Political Review
description:
OPR's Brian Wong interviews Noam Chomsky - leading political scientist, linguist, activist, writer, and activist. In their conversation they discuss Bernie Sanders and the 2020 US Presidential Elections, manufactured consent in the 21st century, China and Russia, and the future of anarchism.
